explanations.A:
The perimeter is the sum of all the lengths around the outside of the shape, four of the lengths are missing. The missing horizontal length is 11m (32 - 11 - 10 = 11) and the three missing vertical lengths are 14m (opposite length marked), 11m (25 - 14 = 11) and 11m.
So, the perimeter is 14 + 10 + 11 + 32 + 11 + 11 + 14 + 11 = 114 m.
